title: India Hits Global Record for Daily New Covid-19 Cases
sub_head: The South Asian nation reported more than 314,000 new coronavirus infections in 24 hours
body:
NEW DELHI—India reported 314,835 new coronavirus cases in the past 24 hours, the health ministry said, the world’s biggest one-day jump in new infections.
The South Asian nation now has 15.9 million Covid-19 cases in total since the start of the pandemic, second only to the U.S. with nearly 31.9 million cases, according to data from Johns Hopkins University.
The world’s fastest-growing surge of infections has been straining the healthcare system in India’s hardest-hit cities, with hospitals running short on oxygen, beds and medical supplies.
Deaths climbed by 2,104 in the past day, bringing the total tally to 184,657, the health ministry said Thursday.
